Hi,

I have started a refactoring on DecideRule with a new design that can =
be viewed at https://github.com/BertrandD/Heritrix-3 .

I would say this de=
sign using delegation/composition is clearer than the existent, which use i=
nheritance extensively. However, this new design does not bring real new fe=
atures. So I don't think that it would be wise to use it even though the ch=
anges should be fully backward compatible. I am open for discussion on that=
 subject.

Anyway, during this work, I noticed the HER-1787 issue on your J=
ira ( https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1787 ). Creating a git reposit=
ory for Heritrix should not be that hard and would really be helpful for fo=
cusing the external community (ie outside 'Internet Archive'). I clearly vo=
te for it but don't want to create an account on your Jira just for that.

=
Regards

Bertrand Dechoux
